column4: Is there an app like active directory for linux to manage 300 ubuntu pc's ?
whats a good admin app for openldap
not even Jesus can beat me.
there is some lame php web admin for it, phpldapadmin i think its called, thing sucks though mate.
is there a gtk administration console at all?
i wouldnt be surprised if some loser decided it was needed
google is your friend on that one
seriously though, ldapvi is the key for impl/adminning an ldap box
